communicationsConfig.managePasswordDescription:
Your password must be at least 8 characters in length and different to previously used passwords.

It must meet at least 3 of the 4 conditions listed below:

  • At least 1 UPPER CASE letter (A-Z)
  • At least 1 lower case letter (a-z)
  • At least 1 number (0-9)
  • At least 1 special character e.g. (@,#,$,%,&, ?)
communicationsConfig.verifyMobileDescription: You should have just received an SMS containing a one time password (OTP) to the mobile associated with your account. Please verify your account by entering the SMS OTP code below.
communicationsConfig.verifyMobileResendText: You can resend the SMS in {timer} seconds
communicationsConfig.verifyMobileDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
communicationsConfig.thankYouDescription: You have successfully reset your password. We’ll now take you to your account page.
